name: Modern Gunship Battle: Navy Warfare Strike
name_original: Modern Gunship Battle: Navy Warfare Strike
description:
Navy Gunship Officer! There is a situation and you have been called to tackle the extreme dangerous navy gunship battle field operation that you have ever been assigned for in Modern Gunship Battle: Navy Warfare Strike.
Your mission is to gun down your enemy’s fleet in the vast oceans and on the open seas, by commanding your naval battleship and destroying your enemy navy warships.
This is a navy battleship war game with different large navy vessels, military paratrooper, army commandos, fighter jets and gunship helicopters in the nay war game Modern Gunship Battle: Navy Warfare Strike. Become a Navy seal commando in the world’s most challenging deep sea battle and take to the enemy warship in this nonstop action packed game! So get ready for deep sea action thrilling experience.
The enemy navy team has attacked and taken your critical naval base and with their leading air craft carrier, they are about to enter through sea water into your land. They have to be stopped before they enter and capture the motherland. Enemy is backed by the gunship helicopters and their Special Forces squad on battle ships in Modern Gunship Battle: Navy Warfare Strike. Your men and team is waiting for your command and courage to stop and destroy the enemy navy fleet at all cost! You are only and last hope to destroy the enemy and win the impossible of us!
